================================================================
        MCQ PAPER GENERATOR - READY TO USE
================================================================

✅ Your executable is ready in the 'dist' folder!

FILES INCLUDED:
- MCQ_Paper_Generator (71 MB) - Main executable
- MCQ_Paper_Generator.app - macOS app bundle  
- license.json - License file (already embedded in exe)

================================================================
HOW TO USE:
================================================================

1. Navigate to the dist folder:
   cd /Users/pasi/MCQ_Paper_Generator/dist

2. Run the application:
   ./MCQ_Paper_Generator
   
   OR double-click MCQ_Paper_Generator in Finder

3. If you get a security warning:
   Right-click → Open → Click "Open" button

================================================================
DISTRIBUTION:
================================================================

To share with others:
1. Copy the entire 'dist' folder
2. Keep license.json with the executable
3. No Python installation needed!

The license is embedded inside the executable, but keeping
license.json in the same folder ensures it works correctly.
